body.subject: Deployment.json created - Epic 28 blocked, awaiting quality gates
body.summary: Created deployment.json with full deployment plan, but status BLOCKED due to quality veto. Deployment readiness checklist includes all requirements from review.json. Ready for unblocking after passing quality gates (implementation.json, test_evidence, security tests, performance tests).
key_points: Deployment.json created with deployment strategy, rollback plans, monitoring setup
Status: BLOCKED - quality veto (implementation.json missing, code not implemented)
Deployment readiness checklist includes all requirements from review.json:
- Code: implementation.json, code implemented, layer boundary validation
- Tests: unit (>= 80%), integration, smoke, performance, security, architecture
- Quality gates: release_gate: true, critical issues resolved, coverage >= 80%
- Infrastructure: shared infra services, health checks, Prometheus metrics
- Observability: metrics, dashboards, alerts, logs, runbook
- Rollback: rollback plan tested, automation verified, regression tests
concerns: Deployment blocked until quality veto is resolved
All requirements from review.json included in deployment readiness checklist
Monitoring and observability setup ready, but requires code implementation (GodAgentMetrics)
Rollback plans defined, but require testing after implementation
body.action_needed: After receiving implementation.json and test_evidence from developer, conduct re-review. If all quality gates pass (release_gate: true), deployment can be unblocked. DevOps ready for deployment after passing quality gates.
